name: Rishi Krishna

top_projects.name: DialDeck
top_projects.description: Dialഡെക്ക് transforms your nostalgic BSNL landline into a cutting-edge stream deck, powered by an Arduino Nano.

top_projects.name: housekeeping_management
top_projects.description: Guest Review Management (Earlier known as housekeeping Management)

top_projects.name: youtube_downloader
top_projects.description: YouTube Audio and Video Downloader! This Python script allows you to download audio and video files from YouTube using their video URLs

DialDeck.summary: Recent activities in the DialDeck repository have focused on implementing features for ESP 32 Bluetooth connectivity and key touches. Multiple push events and pull requests were made to finalize the first version of the feature, including establishment of a simple Bluetooth connection and completion of the user interface.

youtube_downloader.summary: Significant updates were made to the youtube_downloader repository with the addition of new features and files, followed by a successful pull request merging the changes. Although the description lacked details, it's clear that considerable effort went into enhancing the project.

rpicam-apps.summary: The rpicam-apps repository has seen updates focused on fixing .hef file names for yolov6 and yolox. Changes were pushed to correct the filenames for the latest Hailo Boards used in the Raspberry PI AI Kit examples and the official getting started projects.

raspberrypi/rpicam-apps.summary: A significant pull request was proposed for the rpicam-apps repository, correcting .hef file names for yolov6 and yolox. This change resolves the error caused by the file name changes in the latest Hailo Boards when running the Raspberry PI AI Kit examples and getting started projects.

profile_summary:
Rishi Krishna is a talented and innovative developer with a strong foundation in high-performance programming languages such as C++, Rust, and Python. With a solid track record of contributing to various projects and collaborating with fellow developers, Rishi has established a professional network of 19 followers and boasts an impressive portfolio of 58 public repositories, showcasing his ability to consistently deliver quality code.

As a skilled developer, Rishi Krishna excels in designing and implementing efficient, scalable software solutions, leveraging his technical expertise to drive innovation and excellence in his projects. With a keen eye for detail and a commitment to best practices, Rishi delivers high-quality code that meets and exceeds industry standards, making him a valuable asset to any development team.
